News from WorkNano 2019

Publicado em 23 Feb 2019

Participation at WorkNano 2019.

The WorkNano 2019 – Materials Science addressed with modern tools workshop featured a presentation from ComputEEL/MatSci. We shared results on thermodynamics and superconductivity and discussed modern modelling methodologies.
